name: tradetalents
description: A skill exchange platform built with the MERN stack

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev:local --prefix frontend"

author: TradeTalents Team
